content.raw:
I noticed the same problem. Simply opening gazebo and adding a camera to the world starts a huge memory leak on gzclient and gzserver. It leaks around 20Mb/s on my machine and it does not stop even after removing the camera from the world or pausing the simulation.

I'm using Gazebo 7-0-0 compiled on Arch Linux.
content.html:
I noticed the same problem. Simply opening gazebo and adding a camera to the world starts a huge memory leak on gzclient and gzserver. It leaks around 20Mb/s on my machine and it does not stop even after removing the camera from the world or pausing the simulation.

I'm using Gazebo 7-0-0 compiled on Arch Linux.
